Class AskedNotification

java.lang.Object
org.moera.lib.node.types.notifications.Notification
org.moera.lib.node.types.notifications.AskedNotification
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class AskedNotification extends Notification
A remote node asks this node for something.
